thread.title: Trip of the week: Hands on the Himalayas
thread.title_full: Trip of the week: Hands on the Himalayas | The Columbus Dispatch

author: Dispatch
title: Trip of the week: Hands on the Himalayas
text:
Each week, Travel Editor Cindy Decker highlights an interesting travel package sent to her inbox.
Hands on the Himalayas 
JOURNEYS INTERNATIONAL, 1-800-255-8735, WWW.JOURNEYSINTERNATIONAL.COM 
THE TRIP : This 11-day journey into the earthquake-ravaged Okhaldhunga district of Nepal explores the country’s beauty while helping villagers rebuild from this year’s quake.
Guests will hike, meet and eat with villagers and hear their stories. The small tour groups, from six to 10 people, will also spend two days assisting with rebuilding activities such as hauling supplies, painting a school and constructing a house.
The trip also includes an exploration of Kathmandu and other ancient sites. The trip includes five nights of camping in or near villages and four nights of guest-house lodging.
THE COST : from $3,400, double occupancy
 
@DispatchTravel
